text: The Bell from Hell () is a 1973 Spanish-French horror film directed by Claudio Guerin Hill. The film is also known as A Bell from Hell. Guerin, the director, was killed in an accidental fall from the bell tower set while directing the film, and the project had to be completed by Juan Antonio Bardem.Manuel Rojas: Photographic Art (1977), quoted in "Claudio Guerin Hill was killed in Noia in 1973" .
